mapper.insert: insert into emp_library (lib_num, lib_writer, lib_subject, lib_content, emp_num, ip_addr, lib_pw) values(seq_num3.nextval, #{libWriter}, #{libSubject}, #{libContent}, #{empNum}, #{ipAddr}, #{libPw})
mapper.select: select lib_num libNum, lib_writer libWriter, lib_subject libSubject, lib_content libContent, emp_num empNum, ip_addr ipAddr, lib_pw libPw from emp_library
select lib_num libNum, lib_writer libWriter, lib_subject libSubject, lib_content libContent, emp_num empNum, ip_addr ipAddr, lib_pw libPw from emp_library where lib_num=#{libNum}
